Plot: The story of a privileged girl and a charismatic boy whose instant desire sparks a love affair made only more reckless by parents trying to keep them apart.
Title: Endless Love
Writer: Shana Feste (screenplay), Joshua Safran (screenplay), Scott Spencer (novel)
Actors: Alex Pettyfer, Gabriella Wilde, Bruce Greenwood, Joely Richardson
tomatoConsensus: Blander than the original Endless Love and even less faithful to the source material, this remake is clichéd and unintentionally silly.
